form.SN:
v zastareli britanski angleščini se uporablja tudi zapis
gaol
.

sense.def:
A jail
je prostor, kjer imajo ljudi zaklenjene, navadno zato, ker so bili obsojeni za storjeni zločin.

seg.quote: He went to jail for attempted robbery.

sense.def:
To be jailed
pomeni, da nas zaprejo v ječo.

seg.quote: He was jailed for five years.
